extendedInfo.description: As seen on Lifehacker: "Extensive Notes Is a Ridiculously Full Featured Note-Taking App for Android"** Look for Extensive Notes in the October print edition of Inc. Magazine ** ** If you prefer a more simplistic interface check out classic notes **Features:* Note various questions and answers via media tools* Unit converter - Convert length, area, planetary age and weight, liquid volume, time, bandwidth, temperature, flow rate, fuel, power, energy, acceleration, pressure, circular* Ohms law calculator* Decibels of change calculator* Artist image lookup* BMI Calculator* Random password generator* Note attachments such as PDF, word, Powerpoint and so on using extensive notes notepad* Extensive notes notepad can also easily import notes via SD card & web URL* Note qr codes and barcode Notes* Extensive notes notepad can easily import CSV files as todo* Import Contacts in the form of to-do tasks* Export notes as text* Note and lookup slang terms* Note and look various word questions and answers* Easily export the entire note database to SD card which allows for easily going from free to pro version or as a simple means of backup.* Import/Restore notes database via SD* Text-to-Speech (TTS) which allows for notes to be read back to you.* With extensive notes notepad you can also prioritize notes according to you and the order of importance within your everyday life* Extensive notes notepad also allows for you to easily share notes socially such as through Facebook, twitter, or via e-mail, SMS, etc* Sort notes for easier filtering* Search notes for keywords or via hash tags* Extensive notes notepad also allows for Geotagging of notes to remember locations and also allows for looking up street address if available using the longitude and latitude.* Support for multiple audio notes * Support for multiple video notes* Support for multiple image notes* Various calculators such as sales tax calculator, discount calculator, temperature calculator, mortgage calculator, tip calculator and so on. * Support for paint notes* Attach multiple note files * Attach images to notes via Gallery* Attach images to notes via Camera* Attach mp3s and other audio to notes* Attach avis and other video to notes* Private notes - Lock notes so no one can read them* Login screen* Paint notes - Draw notes using your finger* Stick notes to status bar* Comment support - Add comments to existing notes. * Sub notes support* Auto-save note features* Auto Backup * Folder Support* Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)* Body Fat* Body Mass Index (BMI)* Daily Caloric Intake* Max Heart Rate* One Rep Max (1RM)* Target Heart Rate* Waist To Hip Ratio* Water Intake* Notepad features nearly 100 different notes icons so you can customize statusbar notes to your liking rather than be restricted to a single icon. * Support for notes shortcuts to home screen* Support for notes alarms and reminders using the built in system or using Google calendar.* Extensive notes also has todo / to-do support* Note Web accounts* Note Stopwatch values* Note Thesaurus values - Using the thesaurus tool you can easily find similar words.* Multiple thesaurus providers- BigHugeLabs.com- Abbreviations.com- Dictionary.com* Note Dictionary definitions* Multiple dictionary providers- Dictionary.com- Wordnik- WordNet- Abbreviations.com* Note and lookup Abbreviations* Note and lookup various postal codes* Note various conversions* Note and convert temperature, weight, height and more* Note related words* Note New York Times NewsWire articles* Note Digg headlines* Note and lookup slang words* Note Word suggestions* Note Word usage examples* Conversions - convert between various values* Checklist & todo* Shopping list & grocery list* Adjust notes image size - choose between small or large note images* Days Until notes AKA countdown notes - Using this you can easily find how many days left until a specific date

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This app is all inclusive and has plenty of extras that you don\'t get with other notes apps. The newer notes app is awesome too with the same great extras and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app with immaculate support
reviews.comment: Developer has been extremely responsive in helping me to learn the full capability of app. Great fellow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just wish I could select the color I want for my theme. Would like something besides light and dark. Excellent app otherwise. Great for notes in class.
reviews.author: Nicole Brown

reviews.title: Best App Ever!
reviews.comment: Needs Widget!!! But totally worth the money! The one app I would have on my phone if I could only have one! 5 Stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App - Great Value
reviews.comment: Not sure why this app doesn\'t have many, many more downloads. It\'s a fantastic app that is really many apps in one.   Check it out, you will be impressed, I promise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PDF paint notes?
reviews.comment: I either misunderstood the meaning of importing PDFs or I cannot find how to do so... either way this app is promising and i will rate 3 stars for now.  thanks for the good very feature-packed note taking suite! btw i want to import any pdf and take vector paint notes right onto it. thanks again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app and I like it but it does have some shortcomings like not being able to sync notes with Dropbox or Google Drive and the GUI which you have to be quite precise with your tapping sometimes which can be hard for people with fat fingers!!  Will give 5 stars if app is improved!
reviews.author: Ollie Shotton

reviews.title: Failing to create backup.
reviews.comment: This has never happened before and I\'ve had app for over a year. Why now? Any ideas?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really needs a simple widgit for todo lists! But it has amazing features in the program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you have an Android, you should have this app. I feel so powerful now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it, but...
reviews.comment: Will it get updates? Almost been TWO YEARS & your other note app has been updated. Can we get a better widget or some tweaks? Just making sure we haven\'t been forgotten about, especially since we paid!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEST app I own
reviews.comment: Hands down the best money I\'ve ever spent on an app.  Can be set up and used however you personally like to have it set.  Very well done, and response from the developer is second-to-none.  HIGHLY recommend this app!!
reviews.author: Aimee Cranston

reviews.title: Almost there!
reviews.comment: Almost perfect. Larger font option would be nice for tablet users, view links are pretty small. Tried the default large theme and didn\'t see a difference. Would also like to see an option to hide completed tasks for those that keep a running task list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Feature packed is an understatement
reviews.comment: This app should be called \"The kitchen sink\"....it has everything AND the kitchen sink.  Nice clean interface as well.  Well worth a measly $2 for so many features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kitchen sink and all
reviews.comment: Awesome app with tons of useful features. Even with all the awesome features it still retains the ability to quickly jot down notes. Recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Saw it on Lifehacker and I\'m impressed. The features allowed me to uninstalled 4 other apps. The only drawback is that you can\'t make it a widget. The to-do lists could also use percentage completion.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: This app fails because there is no explanation on how to use the private folders, user accounts and login together.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app completely replaced my need for a Moleskine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So amazing.
reviews.comment: It\'s everything I\'ve ever wanted and needed. Best note app, hands down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Haven\'t used all the features yet however what I have used works great. Droid
reviews.author: A Google User
